summary: An e-commerce application for selling ocarinas with multiple product categories and customizable pricing
architectural_notes: Product catalog supports multiple categories and subcategories
Pricing is category-based with different price points per product type

existing_features.title: Create an admin interface that allows bulk price updates by category, enabling future price changes without code modifications

new_feature_requests.summary: Set 3D ocarinas to $9 and ceramic ocarinas to $19
Enable adding products to custom subcategories during upload
Make product names editable and reflect their category names
Allow editing price and name for individual items
Update all items in the '3D Printed' category to have a price of $9.00 (900 cents)
Update all items in the 'Ceramic' category to have a price of $19.00 (1900 cents)
